text:
@NikkiHaley You know what's really going through the roof? COVID19 deaths.  That's what we care about.
#GOPGenocide
#TrumpGolfsAmericansDie 
#TrumpIsNotWell 
#TrumpDeathToll138K 
#trumpVirusKillsAmericans
